Desc.entry: Russian school and social club promoting Russian culture and language. Offers family support and runs children's language classes for children aged 0-4 and 5-11 years. Teaches the Russian language through songs, stories and traditional practices.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sat 11am-1pm or see website for details

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
